name: Myles Safford
text: Good pizza. It’s nice that it’s one price no matter how many toppings you get. $2 more for thicker dough—worth it if you’re a big eater like me. I like getting the cheesy bread with pesto as a cheap but filling dinner. The consistency of …More

name: Joshua Appel
text: This is the second location of Mod Pizza that I’ve tried - had a 5 star experience before, and had a 5 star experience here. Staff are awesome - they joke around, hold conversations, smile... in other words, they are actually enjoying their …More

name: Eric Von Halen
text: Very good pizza

name: Curt Reinholz
text: Best fastest made glutten free pizza I have found! Great service every time, today I online ordered a pizza from the wrong location accidentally... no worries made me a pizza on the spot and didn't charge me for my screw up. Keep up the great work!

name: Jake S
text: Fantastic staff with a fantastic product! I place an online order from MOD once every week or two and they've always gotten my order right and had it ready on time. The ingredients are always fresh and full of flavor. I love that  I can order it however I want my pizza to be!

name: Jim Angus
text:
Tried them for the first time
I like the concept.  Similar to a Subway where you can order something from the menu or request a complete custom pizza.  They offer several options for crusts. …More

name: dan matty
text: Hands down my favorite pizza! I get what I like on my pizza every time. Great concept!

name: Wendy Crisiglio
text: Food is not to bad, price good, not all staff are not the nicest

name: Jerry Schippa
text:
Ordered pizza online. They claimed the pizza would be ready by 5:20 PM.

We pull into the parking lot at about 5:20 and call "Order for Jerry? Got it, …More

name: Denny Berry
text: We enjoyed our pizza and it is reasonably priced I thought. Garlic sticks were tasty too! Service was good and fast. I'll go back and I would recommend!

name: Jordan
text: It’s okay. They forgot parts of our order when doing a pickup and seemed flustered during a rush. So it’s just like that sometimes I suppose.

name: Anthony Davies
text: The bad. Pizza was promised for 6:15 got it at 6:51. The good. They said they would comp my order.

name: Leisa Collins
text: Great crust, perfectly baked.  The person waiting on me was very patient, answering my many questions.  I honestly think the crust is consistently better than the store on the East side.  I'll be back!

name: Deborah Hines
text: Super cute space inside and out, great pizza, friendly staff,.cold beer.. what more can you ask for??

name: Randy Elsner
text: We go to MOD for their consistent quality tasty pizza and the relaxing atmosphere which always has good music playing at a reasonable volume!

name: Tony Scribner
text: Make your own personal pizza. Pick your favorite toppings. Best iced teas.

name: Karin Spanbauer
text: One in Madison is much better....

name: John Wick
text: Best pizza place in the sp handz down love how they greet me and my boys and the food will keep u coming back for sure.... MOD4LIFE

name: Tim Riley
text: Great service, and make the best pizza

name: Kole Rasmussen
text: Friendly helpful staff, great stone oven pizza!

name: Trish Riley
text: Amazing people and food!

name: Andy Noggle
text: Another great MOD Pizza Location!

name: Sabrina
text: Great selection.
